ExternalData.Titlesect: International Convention for the Suppression of Acts of Nuclear Terrorism

TreatyText.Label: Text
TreatyText.Text: United Nations, Treaty Series, vol. 2445, p. 89; A/RES/59/290.

TreatyNote.Text: The above Convention was adopted on 13 April 2005 during the 91st plenary meeting of the General Assembly by resolution A/RES/59/290. In accordance with its article 24, the Convention shall be open for signature by all States from 14 September 2005 until 31 December 2006 at United Nations Headquarters in New York.
